thread.title: Telegraph Fenwick reader events

author: The Telegraph
title: Telegraph Fenwick reader events
text: This November, Telegraph readers are invited to a series of festive shopping events at Fenwick stores across the UK. Don’t miss the opportunity to reserve your place at one of the 10 special evenings, at which you can enjoy up to 20 per cent reductions in store from 6pm. Offering a fantastic range of fashion clothing and homeware, Fenwick is the UK’s leading independent store group. It remains a key destination for the fashion cognoscenti with quirky, fledgling labels sitting alongside international designers. Possessing a reputation for being distinctive, innovative and striking the perfect balance between prestige and value, Fenwick has a portfolio of 11 stores throughout the country. While its flagship store is in London’s New Bond Street, the business was founded in Newcastle upon Tyne in 1882. Today, the north-east shop remains one of the largest department stores in the UK. Christmas shopping evenings at Fenwick Bond Street - Thursday, November 12 Newcastle-upon-Tyne - Monday, November 16 York - Tuesday, November 17 Newcastle-upon-Tyne - Wednesday, November 18 Canterbury - Wednesday, November 18 Bentalls, Kingston - Wednesday, November 18 Brent Cross - Thursday, November 19 Williams & Griffin, Colchester - Monday, November 23 Tunbridge Wells - Tuesday, November 24 Windsor - Wednesday, November 25 How to Claim To reserve tickets for one of the events, purchase The Daily Telegraph on Friday, October 23, 2015 and complete the in-paper coupon. Please note, there is a maximum of two tickets per application. Tickets are subject to availability and will be allocated on a first-come, first-served basis. telegraph.co.uk
